column1: the High Court of Australia in Muschinski v.  Dodcf2  strikes  me as  pertinent.

"A  claim  for 
the  imposition  of a  constructive  trust  in  order  to  provide  a
remedy for a disappointed expectation engendered by a representation made

in 
the  context  of incomplete  contractual  negotiations 
is, 
in  my  opinion,

misconceived  and  cannot  be  sustained  by  reliance  on 
unconscionable
behavior on the part of the representor"
